fields.headline: Paul gets the boot
fields.bodyText: Paul Clarke tonight became the seventh contestant to be evicted from the Big Brother household. The 25-year-old car designer punched the air after finding out he had been evicted, then turned and hugged Helen Adams, the hairdresser who he has flirted with for weeks. A total of 84% of viewers voted for Paul to go, while just 16% wanted to get rid of Helen, who was also nominated by the housemates. Talk about it Who do you think should be evicted?
